name: Hive Jump
description: HIVE JUMP is a sci-fi action platformer for 1-4 players blending run ‘n gun gameplay with roguelike elements.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista / 7 Processor: Intel Core™ Duo or faster Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB Storage: 1400 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista / 7 Processor: Intel Core™ Duo or faster Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1GB Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1400 MB available space Additional Notes: Xbox 360 controller or other XInput-compatible controller
